Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-61985 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-61985 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-9, affected by CVE-2025-61985
